description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=0/3. Spyleaks is a old school game with a modern twist. 3 game genres coexist while Spy, Jules' agent, tries to recover important intelligence from the evil corporation that wants to overcome Freedom City. 25 brain-shaking puzzles, 5 action-packed shooter levels, five exciting escapes against the clock and an intriguing spy story with a grand-finale!
description.short: Spyleaks is a old school game with a modern twist. 3 game genres coexist while Spy, Jules' agent, tries to recover important intelligence from the evil corporation that wants to overcome Freedom City. 25 brain-shaking puzzles, 5 action-packed shooter levels, five exciting escapes against the clock and an intriguing spy story with a grand-finale!
